name: Yarn Style 毛线玩具风格
description:
Chibi ver:

I'm not sure if anyone likes this style, but this version is specifically designed for the dolls with the ratio of the head to the body is 1:2.

The doll's face will have blush in the shape of knitted yarn, and if you don't like it, you can use "(dirty face, blush:2)" in the negative prompt to help improve it.

I recommend using the REV animated model with a weight of 0.6-0.8.

我不知道是否有人喜欢这个风格。这个版本专门为了二头身的毛线娃娃设计，娃娃的脸上会有毛线状的腮红，如果你不喜欢它，可以在negative prompt使用"(dirty face,  blush:2)"有助于改善。

推荐模型REV animated，权重0.6-0.8.

/////

I added some yarn toys and added some It Takes Two. I recommend using the models anythingv4.5 and Silicon29 with weights between 0.7-0.9. You can combine them with other character lorases without having to lower the weight much.

Adjusting the yarn weight can affect the coverage of the yarn.

If you don't add "1girl" and write "animal" or "plant" directly, you can get cute yarn toys.

加了点毛线玩具，加了点双人成行。

推荐模型anythingv4.5和Silicon29，权重0.7-0.9。可以结合其他人物lora使用，基本不用降低权重。

调整yarn权重可以影响毛线的覆盖程度。

不加1girl，直接写动物或者植物的话，你可以得到可爱的毛线玩具。
